TopicTitle: Alpha Lifter - 36+ ton SSTO spaceplane with modular cargo bay

Articles.Content:
An A-Frame hollow-bodied design you can put whatever you want in - fuel, passenger space, space station parts etc. The bottom is open for the full length of the fuselage, so you can drop loads out.

Able to lift a 36-ton jumbo64 fuel tank to orbit - probably more, I havent tweaked with ascent profiles much.

A sample payload - a jumbo64 at the back mounted on docking ports plus a small fuel tank in the front for a little higher orbit.

http://evilc.com/files/games/ksp/alpha.zip

Will post more soon, I gotta hit the sack, I just wanted to get this badboy out there and see what people thought.

I reckon I can reduce the strutting some, but it has been engineered for an atmospheric ascent @ 2x warp, during which forces seem to be amplified, so I made it as rigid as possible.

Edited May 3, 2013 by evilC
